## Install mongo

[Install MongoDB Community Edition on macOS â€” MongoDB Manual](https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/tutorial/install-mongodb-on-os-x/)

```bash
brew tap mongodb/brew
brew install mongodb-community@4.4
brew install mongodb-database-tools
brew link mongodb-database-tools
```

## Run mongo 

opt01: Run manually:

```bash
mongod --config /usr/local/etc/mongod.conf --fork
```

Shutdown:

opt01:

```bash
killall mongod
```

opt02:

```bash
mongo
```

```bash
use admin
db.shutdownServer()
```

## Basic usage mongo

```bash
mongo
```

```bash
show dbs
use <db>
db.getCollectionNames()
  ##> 	"example-histories",
  ##> 	"examples",
```

Export as json

```bash
mongoexport -d clojuredocs -c users -o users.json --jsonArray 
```


## Query examples
 
https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/reference/sql-comparison/

``` bash
db.plan_jobs.find()
  ##> { "_id" : ObjectId("592d2a834eb11bdcb734a26c"), ...} ...
db.getCollection('plan_jobs').find()
  ##> { "_id" : ObjectId("592d2a834eb11bdcb734a26c"), ...} ...
``` 

``` bash
db.plan_jobs.find(
    {},
    { depot: 1, submitDate: 1, status: 1, _id: 0 }
)
  ##> { "depot" : "CORLU", "status" : "TAMAMLANDI", "submitDate" : "2017-05-30 11:12:37" }
  ##> { "depot" : "CORLU", "status" : "TAMAMLANDI", "submitDate" : "2017-05-24 14:20:04" }
``` 

## Export a table/collection

``` bash
mongoexport -h $host -u $username -p $pass -d $database -c $collection -o $collection.json --jsonArray 
``` 

## Update documents

https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/reference/method/db.collection.update/

``` bash
db.collection.update(
   <query>,
   { $set: { status: "D" }, $inc: { quantity: 2 } },
   ...
)
``` 

``` bash
db.books.update(
   { _id: 1 },
   {
     $inc: { stock: 5 },
     $set: {
       item: "ABC123",
       "info.publisher": "2222",
       tags: [ "software" ],
       "ratings.1": { by: "xyz", rating: 3 }
     }
   }
)
``` 

https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/tutorial/update-documents/

``` bash
db.inventory.updateOne(
   { item: "paper" },
   {
     $set: { "size.uom": "cm", status: "P" },
     $currentDate: { lastModified: true }
   }
)
```
